title: Sinister Seductions
description: Sinister Seductions is an anthology of paranormal romance stories edited by Roxanne Rhoads.This collection consists of paranormal dark desires and supernaturally seductive tales of all things sinister and scary â€“ think vampires, werewolves, demons, witches, and ghosts.The Anthology is for the Paranormal Romance adult fan base with all levels of heat and is not appropriate for the YA fan base. All romantic heat levels from softly romantic to hot and steamy fill this anthology with unique and edgy twists on popular paranormal characters - new, dark, delicious, and sexy. Sinister Seductions is not the common vampire meets human, bites and has sex with human and falls in love story- it is something unexpected, something new and delightfully dark.
author: Roxanne Rhoads
